name: VR Sniper Hunt
description:
"VR Sniper Hunt" is a standing-based VR game that challenges players with waves of enemies in each level, each lasting 90 minutes. Strategy and precision are key as players aim for maximum enemy takedowns, with headshots offering a swift and satisfying elimination. Are you ready to embark on this adrenaline-pumping sniper adventure? Join the hunt and test your skills in "VR Sniper Hunt"!

The game features five thrilling themes to explore:



Zombie Shooting: Immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Test your survival skills as you aim for headshots to take down hordes of the undead.



Dino Shooting: Travel back in time to a prehistoric era where dinosaurs roam the earth. Take on the role of a skilled sniper and hunt down these ancient creatures.



Underwater Shooting: Dive into the depths of the ocean and encounter a variety of aquatic creatures. Equip your sniper rifle to take down dangerous sea creatures lurking in the depths.



Fantasy Shooting for Kids: Delve into a whimsical world filled with magical creatures and fantastical landscapes. This theme is designed specifically for younger players, offering a safe and engaging shooting experience.



Cops and Riots Shooting: Step into the shoes of a law enforcement officer tasked with maintaining order in a city plagued by riots. Navigate through chaotic streets and take down rioters to restore peace.
